import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; function About() { return ( <>

About

I'm Rowan Morrison, a multidisciplinary illustrator and graphic designer based in London. I create expressive visuals and intuitive digital experiences, blending storytelling and technology to create something new.



With a background in both graphic design and front-end development, I enjoy working across disciplines to bring ideas to life.

Accolades

Great

Simona Deifta, CEO of NOJO

); } export default About;
